overview_of_class:
Topics in Hebrew Literature
1. Poetics and Politics in contemporary Hebrew Literature
2. Prose and Poetry

The class offers reading from contemporary Israeli literature, prose and poetry. We will discuss various definitions of the "poetic" and the "political" in literature in general, and specifically in the Hebrew literary republic. The case of the Hebrew language as a sacred language and as the language of a national literature will be the starting point of the discussions, and will offer a unique platform to view how literature and history are intertwined.
name: Hebrew III: Topics in Hebrew Literature
subject: HEBREW
